position: Co-Founder Bolna | Bain & Company | IIT Delhi

experience.title: Chief Executive Officer
experience.description: Meet Bolna, an end to end infra to run and manage truly conversational human-like voice AI agents.Whether you're looking to automate routine customer conversations, free up bandwidth of your comms team, or wishing to add conversational voice functionalities to your business, Bolna is the platform you need!#3 Product of the Day (18/09/24)#1 Customer Communications Product of the Week (16-22 Sep 2024)
